mapper.select: select n.id, m.name, n.subject, n.content, n.readcount, n.date from notice n Join member m ON n.member_id = m.id order by id desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select n.id, n.member_id, m.name, n.subject, n.content, n.readcount, n.date from notice n JOIN member m ON n.member_id = m.id where n.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update notice set readcount=readcount+1 where id=#{id}
update notice set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select n.id, m.name, n.subject, n.content, n.readcount, n.date from notice n JOIN member m ON n.member_id = m.id where n.subject like #{search} order by id desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select count(id) from notice where subject like #{search}
